headline: Will Constellation Brands' (STZ) Portfolio Shift Reveal Strength or Uncertainty in Alcohol Demand Trends?
summary: In August 2025, Constellation Brands announced the sale of its Copper & Kings American Brandy Company to Bourdon Spirits Company, reflecting a continued effort to focus on its premium wine and spirits portfolio. This move coincided with wider industry concerns, such as the possible impact of anti-obesity medications on alcohol consumption and ongoing analyst scrutiny over shifting demographics and softer beer demand.
